field.label: NOTE: Settings below must not be changed after account registration.
E-Mail Address
field.help: Optional e-mail address for this account.

field.label: ACME CA
field.help: The ACME CA that should be used for this account and all associated certificates. Note that some of them offer paid services and may require a subscription. Check the acme.sh documentation for a list of supported CAs.

field.label: Custom CA URL
field.help: The HTTPS URL of the custom ACME CA that should be used for this account and all associated certificates. If using your own CA, make sure the Root CA is added to OPNsense's trust store. For example: https://acme-v02.api.letsencrypt.org/directory or https://ca.internal/acme/directory

field.label: Key Identifier
field.help: An optional value provided by the CA when using ACME External Account Binding (EAB).

field.label: HMAC Key
field.help: An optional value provided by the CA when using ACME External Account Binding (EAB).
